newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Warrant talk boosts Hutchison volume.
newsitem.headline: Warrant talk boosts Hutchison volume.

text.p: Trading volume in Hutchison Whampoa Ltd shares got a boost on Wednesday by rumours that a covered warrant would be issued on the stock, brokers said.

"We heard that the warrant would be priced at HK$1.01 with gearing at 4.8 times and a premium of 10.8 percent, but the issue size is not yet known by the market," said a sales manager at a regional brokerage.
Speculation that the issuer would have to buy stock to cover the warrant pushed trade, brokers said.
Hutchison shares, which were the third most actively traded by turnover, were unchanged at HK$48.20 in late trade on volume of 2.02 million shares. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6370
